meanings.sent1: The cake had a tiered design with different layers of frosting.
meanings.sent2: The wedding cake was beautifully tiered, with each layer a different flavor.
meanings.sent3: The tiered seating at the concert made it easy for everyone to see the stage.
meanings.sent4: Her tiered approach to organizing her closet made finding clothes a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The tiered waterfall cascaded down the rocks, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.sent1: The stadium had tiered seating for better visibility of the game.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf was tiered, allowing for easy organization of books.
meanings.sent3: The tiered cupcakes at the party were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: The garden had tiered planters, each holding a different type of flower.
meanings.sent5: The tiered structure of the building gave it a unique and modern look.

meanings.definition: Divided into sections or levels of importance
meanings.sent1: The company had a tiered system for employee benefits based on tenure.
meanings.sent2: The school's library had a tiered classification system for books.
meanings.sent3: The tiered pricing strategy for the products catered to different customer segments.
meanings.sent4: The organization had a tiered hierarchy, with clear levels of authority.
meanings.sent5: The tiered ranking system in the competition motivated participants to excel.
